member.name: M:netbusters.Controllers.TeamController.GetTeams
member.summary: Retrieves all teams associated with the logged-in user.

member.name: M:netbusters.Controllers.UserController.Login(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Logs user into the system and retrieves authentication token.

member.name: M:netbusters.Controllers.UserController.DeleteAccount
member.summary: Deletes the currently authenticated user's account.
member.remarks: This can only be done by the logged in user.

member.name: M:netbusters.Controllers.UserController.UpdateUser(netbusters.Models.User)
member.summary: Updates the currently authenticated user's information.
member.remarks: This can only be done by the logged in user.

member.name: M:netbusters.Controllers.UserController.GetUser
member.summary: Retrieves the currently authenticated user's information.
member.remarks: This can only be done by the logged in user.
